description:
MediPDA is a modular medical calculator comprising commonly used calculations and algorithms in medicine. If you are in the healthcare field you will find it invaluable to calculate things like BSA, GFR, Anion gap, Apgar score, Glasgow coma scale and much much more. 

With over 60,000 downloads in the App Catalog it is one of the most popular medical apps for webOS. This is a rewrite of the original app and it has been ported over to Ares development for more rapid updates. The Calculate button has been moved and it is now more easily accessible at the bottom of the screen. You can choose your default units (SI/US) from a Preferences page in the App menu.

Update 0.5.0
Now Touchpad compatible search in main screen. Pre3 compatible as well.

Update 0.5.1
Added Osmolar gap module
